pageContext.collection_description: Contains Victor's own music as well as arrangements that he made and some scripts. Young had his own radio show, ca. 1934, and was either the conductor and/or the composer-arranger for several radio programs, including the Carnation Contented Hour, May, 1950-December, 1951, Texaco Star Theatre, Westinghouse radio programs, ca. 1938-1945, and the Woolworth Radio Hour.
